channel.title: Mastercommand
channel.description: hai guys i just wanna know if u guys can post what i need to put in for a ::master command. kthanks:)

item.title: Mastercommand
item.dc:creator: @Daniel8 Daniel™
item.description:
@Daniel8 wrote:

[quote=“chaotic twin, post:1, topic:405072”]hai guys i just wanna know if u guys can post what i need to put in for a ::master command.
kthanks:)[/quote]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“master”)) {
if(c.playerRights >= 0)
{
return;
}
for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
c.playerLevel = 99;
c.playerXP = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Mastercommand
item.dc:creator: @couttiiee couttiiee
item.description:
@couttiiee wrote:

are you using [pi]?
if so use this

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“master”)) {
if(c.playerRights == 0 || c.playerRights == 5 || c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2){
return;
}
for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
c.playerLevel[i] = 99;
c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
}
}

place it in commands.java

Read full topic
